name: Gentleman
description: Gentleman $MAN represents the original telegram mascot introduced in early 2014. A young capitalist charcacter made by telegrams creative director, whos purpose is to explain telegram's functions. $MAN token also wants to create something bigger in the crypto space in general. Gentleman aims to gather like-minded individuals who believe in the power of good deeds, manners, and ethical living, creating a network where each token represents a pledge towards societal improvement
